name: Block Jumper (tedbolt)
description:
Block Jumper

Game 9 of 12 in a weekly game challenge

Navigate through 3 different caves and reach the end in this minimal platformer. Use the power of your rocket boots to land in hard to reach areas.

Side note: Sadly there's something a little messed up with corner collisions so you may up a little twitchy. Hopefully this will be fixed in the next game.


CONTROLS:
Left Arrow : Run left
Right Arrow : Run right
Up Arrow : Jump
S : Boost upward
A : Boost to the right
D : Boost to the left
